story_99_00010/2401_1001_0100_10:
Konnichiwa! Bonjour! Pleasure to meet you.
I’m Professor Bellis.
story_99_00010/2401_1001_0200_10: I’m doing research on sync pairs here on Pasio.
story_99_00010/2401_1001_0400_10:
Aha! Brock and Misty mentioned that they’d
teamed up with a promising young Trainer.
That hat of yours fits their description.
story_99_00010/2401_1001_0500_10:
So, how are you liking the team battling style
of the island so far?
story_99_00010/2401_0401_0700_10:
Eccellente! 
I hope you continue to have a great time here!
story_99_00010/2401_0402_0900_10:
Don’t worry! You’ll get the hang of it, mi [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="amigo" F="amiga" ].
I can tell you’re passionate about growing
stronger. That passion is key!
story_99_00010/2401_1001_1000_10:
We already know that sync pairs have incredible
potential, and there’s still so much we’ve yet
to discover!
story_99_00010/2401_1001_1100_10:
Next time my research yields some exciting
results, I’ll be sure to let you know, OK?
story_99_00010/2401_1001_1200_10:
Oh my. Is that the time? I need to do some
shopping and hurry back to the lab!
story_99_00010/2401_1001_1300_10:
By the way, the shop here has all sorts of handy
items in stock. Why don’t you go have a look?
story_99_00010/2401_1001_1400_10:
I suppose I’ll leave you to it for now!
I’d better be off. Do svidaniya!
Good luck!
story_99_00010/2401_1001_1500_10:
Welcome, welcome! Today is our grand opening,
so feel free to stop by and browse through our
stock any time!
story_99_00010/2401_1001_1600_10:
You can make changes to your team right
over here. Why don’t you try doing it now?
story_99_00010/2401_1001_1700_10: Perfect! You successfully edited your team.
story_99_00010/2401_1001_1800_10:
Feel free to use team editing to your advantage
whenever you meet new sync pairs!
story_99_00010/2401_1001_1900_10:
Thank you for stopping by.
I look forward to your next visit!
